entry.title: Quota Increase for Free Plan
entry.summary: Talking with a new user in Discord yesterday, we realised that the Free Plan quota of 600 seconds (10 minutes) per month CPU processing time on the server was not long enough. It doesn't really give someone long enough to try a few experiments and see how something works in the wild for the rest of the month. We have updated the quota to 6000 seconds (100 minutes) which we think will be better. If you have any feedback or questions, please let us know.

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Hello! This is not really a blog post - more of a placeholder for future blog posts about Shadowdog and related topics.
